name: fire banshee
dieMessage: a fire @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@banshee@c-reset@ emits a wave of intense heat as it meets its death.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swipes a sword made entirely of @c-red@fire@c-reset@ at @player-name@!
Flames and heat rumble within @npc-color-name@ before the @npc-color-name@ aims a stream of @c-red@flames@c-reset@ at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ steps in toward @player-name@ and blasts them with a wall of @c-red@flames@c-reset@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ transforms into a glowing ball of plasma, rematerializing behind @player-name@ and @c-yellow@BLASTING@c-reset@ @player-name@ with a powerful wave of heat!
The @npc-color-name@ morphs into multiple forms of itself and unleashes a horrific @c-red@BURNING@c-reset@ attack from multiple directions!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swipes a sword made entirely of @c-red@fire@c-reset@ at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ pulsates with light and heat.
